answers.answer: The last time I went to the doctor I had gained 30 lbs and I was only 24 weeks
I'm 28 weeks now and I don't know how many lbs I've gained since I've been to the doctor

I've gained 23 pounds and I'm in the 27th week. My midwife isn't too worried. I am lol. But now I'm just focusing on eating healthy and ensuring it's good food. :) don't worry too much momma! Pregnancy is temporary and there's lots of time to lose the weight after baby is born :).

There's plenty of time to lose it, but don't go out of control with it. My sister did and at 30 weeks, she gained 40 pounds and ended up with gestational diabetes. So now she's on special diets and whatnot.
I'm 29 weeks and only gained 11 pounds. This is my 3rd pregnancy
I'm 30 weeks and have gained 35 pounds ..it really ***** I'm super fat
Have u been using the weight tab on here? I find it extrely helpful. Ive gained two pounds more than they recommended so far but if I stay on track at least itll keep me below 35 pounds weight gain.

question: I feel like I've gained so much to be now 27 weeks I was 135 pre pregnancy and last month when I went I was already 164, I go to the doctor again Wednesday and I won't be surprise if I'm 170plus. All I want is chocolate chocolate chocolate! Also I love my fruits and pizza. I'm real picky with dinner and meal time if it doesn't sound good then I won't eat it. Is this normal? This is my first child and I don't look huge at all but the pounds have added so quickly for me which is scary. I feel like I eat what I crave and can't help it
title: Cravings & fast weight gain
